mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, a.*from (select * from board order by bgroup desc,bstep asc) a ) where rnum>=1 and rnum<=20

select * from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY bgroup desc,bstep asc) as rnum,a.* from board a) where rnum = ((select rnum from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY bgroup desc,bstep asc) as rnum,a.bno from board a ) where bno=#{bno})-1)
